mean_en: on or to the further side of something; later than a particular time; more than something; used to say that something is not possible; too far or too advanced for somebody/something
sentence: I couldn\u0027t hit him as he was beyond my reach.
sentence_trans: 我打不了他，因为我够不着他。
word_etyma: be强调 + yond那边 → 超过
